com.aionemu.gameserver.model.geometry
Class AbstractArea

java.lang.Object
  com.aionemu.gameserver.model.geometry.AbstractArea
All Implemented Interfaces:
Area
Direct Known Subclasses:
CylinderArea, PolyArea, RectangleArea
public abstract class AbstractArea
extends java.lang.Object
implements Area

Class with basic method implementation for ares.
If possible it should be subclassed.
In other case Area should be implemented directly

getDistance2D

public double getDistance2D(java.awt.Point point)
Returns distance from point to closest point of this area ignoring z.
Returns 0 if point is inside area.

Returns:

getClosestPoint

public java.awt.Point getClosestPoint(java.awt.Point point)
Returns closest point of area to given point.
Returns point with coords = point arg if is inside

Specified by:
getClosestPoint in interface Area
Parameters:
point - point to check
Returns:
closest point

getClosestPoint

public Point3D getClosestPoint(Point3D point)
Returns closest point of area to given point.
Works exactly like Area.getClosestPoint(int, int) if Area.isInsideZ(int) returns true.
In other case closest z edge is set as z coord.

Specified by:
getClosestPoint in interface Area
Parameters:
point - point to check
Returns:
closest point of area to point

getClosestPoint

public Point3D getClosestPoint(int x,
                               int y,
                               int z)
Returns closest point of area to given coords.
Works exactly like Area.getClosestPoint(int, int) if Area.isInsideZ(int) returns true.
In other case closest z edge is set as z coord.

Specified by:
getClosestPoint in interface Area

x - x coord
y - y coord
z - z coord
Returns:
